description: Construction of roof extensions at fourth, sixth and seventh floors; installation of roof top plant; formation of new roof top terraces at fourth, fifth, sixth and seventh floors; alterations to the front steps fronting Finsbury Square; formation of new cycle entrances to Lackington Street; landscaping to internal courtyards; change of use (86 sq.m GIA) to flexible office/retail (Class B1(a)/A1) at ground floor level on Lackington Street; and other ancillary and associated works..
